message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. I believe this is fair considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share now, but I think it's fair considering the inflation is affecting us both equally. This way, I'll have a buffer for future rounds.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the $10,000. I believe fairness should be our guiding principle, especially when the value of money is diminishing.
